message.content:
Sure! Here’s a list of 50 "message of the day" quotes formatted as an array of JSON objects:

```json
[
    {"message": "The only way to do great work is to love what you do.", "author": "Steve Jobs"},
    {"message": "Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.", "author": "John Lennon"},
    {"message": "Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.", "author": "Sam Levenson"},
    {"message": "You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.", "author": "Wayne Gretzky"},
    {"message": "Believe you can and you're halfway there.", "author": "Theodore Roosevelt"},
    {"message": "Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.", "author": "Winston S. Churchill"},
    {"message": "What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.", "author": "Ralph Waldo Emerson"},
    {"message": "Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.", "author": "William James"},
    {"message": "You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.", "author": "C.S. Lewis"},
    {"message": "The best way to predict your future is to create it.", "author": "Peter Drucker"},
    {"message": "In the middle of every difficulty lies opportunity.", "author": "Albert Einstein"},
    {"message": "Failing doesn’t mean the game is over, it means try again with experience.", "author": "Anonymous"},
    {"message": "Keep your face always toward the sunshine—and shadows will fall behind you.", "author": "Walt Whitman"},
    {"message": "It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.", "author": "Confucius"},
    {"message": "Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life.", "author": "Steve Jobs"},
    {"message": "Everything you’ve ever wanted is on the other side of fear.", "author": "George Addair"},
    {"message": "Hardships often prepare ordinary people for an extraordinary destiny.", "author": "C.S. Lewis"},
    {"message": "Don't wait for the perfect moment. Take the moment and make it perfect.", "author": "Anonymous"},
    {"message": "Dream big and dare to fail.", "author": "Norman Vaughan"},
    {"message": "The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.", "author": "Eleanor Roosevelt"},
    {"message": "Just when the caterpillar thought the world was over, it became a butterfly.", "author": "Anonymous"},
    {"message": "The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.", "author": "Franklin D. Roosevelt"},
    {"message": "Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.", "author": "William James"},
    {"message": "You are enough just as you are.", "author": "Becky Allyson"},
    {"message": "It always seems impossible until it’s done.", "author": "Nelson Mandela"},
    {"message": "Life isn't about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.", "author": "George Bernard Shaw"},
    {"message": "Opportunities don't happen, you create them.", "author": "Chris Grosser"},
    {"message": "Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.", "author": "Theodore Roosevelt"},
    {"message": "Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.", "author": "Henry David Thoreau"},
    {"message": "The best revenge is massive success.", "author": "Frank Sinatra"},
    {"message": "Believe in yourself and all that you are.", "author": "Christian D. Larson"},
    {"message": "To live will be an awfully big adventure.", "author": "J.M. Barrie"},
    {"message": "Everything has beauty, but not everyone sees it.", "author": "Confucius"},
    {"message": "Life is short, and it is up to you to make it sweet.", "author": "Sarah Louise Delany"},
    {"message": "With the new day comes new strength and new thoughts.", "author": "Eleanor Roosevelt"},
    {"message": "The secret of getting ahead is getting started.", "author": "Mark Twain"},
    {"message": "Don't limit your challenges. Challenge your limits.", "author": "Anonymous"},
    {"message": "Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.", "author": "Mahatma Gandhi"},
    {"message": "What we fear doing most is usually what we most need to do.", "author": "Tim Ferriss"},
    {"message": "Your limitation—it’s only your imagination.", "author": "Anonymous"},
    {"message": "Dream it. Wish it. Do it.", "author": "Anonymous"},
    {"message": "Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day in and day out.", "author": "Robert Collier"},
    {"message": "The harder the conflict, the more glorious the triumph.", "author": "Thomas Paine"},
    {"message": "You must be the change you wish to see in the world.", "author": "Mahatma Gandhi"},
    {"message": "Every moment is a fresh beginning.", "author": "T.S. Eliot"},
    {"message": "Believe you can and you're halfway there.", "author": "Theodore Roosevelt"},
    {"message": "Challenges are what make life interesting; overcoming them is what makes life meaningful.", "author": "Joshua J. Marine"},
    {"message": "Live life to the fullest, and focus on the positive.", "author": "Matt Cameron"}
]
```

Feel free to use or modify this list as needed!
